colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES DRIN CAN N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD KYI TSOGS 'KHOR BYA TSUL BDE CHEN 'DOD DGU'I CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI LAM 'DIR DAD MOS KYI 'JUG PA GZHAN DRING MI 'JOG PA'I GNAM BSGOS DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG PA'I BKA'I LUNG BLON CHEN MO BSOD NAMS BSTAN 'DZIN DPAL 'BYOR TSE RING MCHOG DANG, GANG GI BSKYED BYED YUM RIN SKYED 'JOM NAS KYANG BKA' GNANG BA'I DGONGS BZHED BZHIN, LAM 'DI'I RNAL 'BYOR SPYOD PA RGYAL SRAS BSKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SKYABS MGON BKA' DRIN 'KHOR MED RGYAL BA'I DBANG PO BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG BDE MCHOG TSOGS 'KHOR LA GZHI BYAS TE DAD PA CHEN POS RANG GIS BSTI GNAS SU PHRAL DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI RAB BRTAN GYIS BGYIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
